The man shown in the photo is her husband, who assists her by watering the soil for getting good quality production. They crop different kinds of vegetables and fruits and sell them in the local market. 

She has gradually improved her business with the support of Kashf Foundation. In order to purchase different types of seeds with packs of insecticides and pesticides, Muglani applied a loan of 30,000 PKR (Pakistan rupees). She is in her second loan cycle. This loan would help her to grow more crops, which ultimately helps in generating more cash.

loans.use: to purchase different types of seeds with packs of insecticides and pesticides.

loans.name: Kofi

texts.en:
Although he has received no prior formal education, Kofi is an entrepreneur. He specializes as a blacksmith in Enyaadze (near Cape Coast). He has been involved in this enterprise for 10 years. Kofi is married and has three children. His wife works as a farmer. The proceeds from his business normally go towards helping his wife cover the family’s general expenses and paying their children’s school fees. 

Kofi will use the loan to purchase increased amounts of tools and other materials, thus aiding him to improve his overall sales. With the new profits from his expanded business, Kofi plans to further diversify the type of products that he sells, hence adapting to changing customer preferences.

loans.use: to purchase increased amounts of tools and other materials.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is a 46-year-old married father of two children. He works as a public taxi driver and has his own vehicle for the job. He works every day from sunrise, when people rush to get to their work, till night. He has been working in this field for 23 years now. His wife is unemployed, which renders him the only financial provider of the family. One of his children is enrolled in a private school, while the other is enrolled in a public school, which means that he has schooling tuition and fees on top of the other family expenses. Thus, maximizing his revenue is a priority. 

He contacted Al Majmoua in order to acquire a loan for the maintenance of his car, and to renovate his house (with paint, electronics, etc.). A loan would alleviate the burden of the other expenses mentioned above. As for the future, Ahmad wishes to buy a new car for his work as a taxi driver in order to increase the number of customers and tourists.

loans.use: To pay for necessary maintenance for his car and renovate his house.

loans.name: Fatoumata

texts.fr:
Madame Fatoumata est une des plus braves femmes de ce banc villageois, très dynamique et déterminée à faire progresser son activité, de plus elle jouit d’une expérience avérée dans le commerce de détail partant des marchés hebdomadaires.

Elle est mariée et mère de trois enfants dont une fille. Son activité consiste à l’achat de produits alimentaires au marché hebdomadaire international de la région pour la revente dans son village et les villages aux alentours.

Pour ce prêt, elle compte acheter en quantité : 10 sacs de riz à 13 000 F Cfa, 05 sacs d’ognon de production locale à 10 000 F Cfa le sac, 02 sacs de patates douces 10 000 F Cfa, 01 bidon d’huile de palm à 20 000 F Cfa, 03 cartons de savon à 7 000 F Cfa le carton. Elle espère obtenir en moyenne 15000 F Cfa de bénéfice net par semaine.

Cette marge elle l’utilisera pour le renforcement de son épargne d’une part et d’autre part pour faire face aux frais scolaires de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Mrs. Fatoumata is one of the most courageous women of this "Banc Villageois" loan association; very dynamic and determined to advance her business. Moreover, she has a proven track record as a retail merchant in the weekly markets.

She is a married mother of three children, including a daughter. Her activity consists in buying food products at the regional weekly international market for resale in her village and villages in the vicinity.

For this loan, she will buy in quantity: 10 bags of rice at 13,000 FCFA per bag, 5 bags of locally produced onions at 10,000 FCFA per bag, 2 bags of sweet potatoes at 10,000 FCFA per bag, 1 can of palm oil for 20,000 FCFA, 3 boxes of soap at 7000 FCFA per box.

She hopes to average net weekly profits of 15,000 FCFA.

She will use her profits both to strengthen her savings and to meet her children's educational expenses.

loans.use: buy large quantities of food products (rice, onions, sweet potatoes, palm oil, soap)

loans.name: Ana Patricia

texts.es: Ana es una mujer dedicada a la enseñanza principalmente de los niños, ya que su profesión es  maestra de educación primaria la cual tiene 16 años de trabajar como Docente, es casada con 3 personas a su cargo a los cuales les ayuda para su desarrollo, actualmente tiene una necesidad de mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda, por eso visito a ceprodel para ser beneficiada con un financiamiento el que utilizaría en la compra de Zinc, perlines, puertas, golosos y mano de obra.  Para la mejora de su vivienda, la que le brindara mejores condiciones  de su vida en su núcleo familiar.
texts.en: Ana primarily works in children's education, being an elementary school teacher for 16 years. She is married with 3 dependents, whom she helps in their development. Right now she needs to make improvements to her house, which is why she visited Ceprodel to be a beneficiary of a loan. She will use the loan to buy tin roofing, tiles, doors, screws and labor. Improving her home will improve the living conditions for her family.

loans.use: to buy tin roofing, tiles, doors, screws, labor.

loans.name: Amy

texts.fr:
Madame Amy, mariée et mère de famille, évolue dans le commerce depuis plus de 10 ans. Tous les jours, elle commence sa journée à 10h pour la finir à 17h. Avec le crédit, elle va acheter des tissus pour revendre. Elle possède une cantine dans le marché et voudrait améliorer son stock c’est pourquoi, elle s’est tournée vers U-IMCEC pour recevoir un appui financier. Elle n’a pas de charges et  ses bénéfices sont reversés dans l’activité.
Elle n’a qu’un vœu, celui de posséder un grand magasin de tissus et de devenir une grande commerçante de renommée.
texts.en:
Mrs. Amy, a married mother, has been in the retail business for over 10 years. She begins her workday at 10 am to finish at 5 pm.

She will use the loan to buy fabrics for resale. She has a stall in the market and would like to increase her stock of goods which is why she turned to U-IMCEC to receive financial support. She has no financial burdens and profits are reinvested in the business.

She has only one wish, that of owning a large fabrics store and becoming a renowned merchant.

loans.use: buy fabric for resale at the market

loans.name: Yelba Verónica

texts.es:
La señora yelba vive en  la cuidad de Managua trabaja  como conserje en una universidad.  Donde trabaja en un horario de 8am  5 pm luego se traslada a su casa para atender a su pequeños hijos ya que es madre soltera y es mayor el esfuerzo  para salir adelante con sus hijos que están en edad escolar.

Doña yelba está solicitando un crédito a kiva para hacerles algunos cambios necesario a su vivienda como es el sistema electico esto lo hace con el fin de asegurar su vivienda.  a la vez agradece a ceprodel ya que con los créditos obtenidos ha mejorado su casa poco a poco y también  le han servido para pagarle los estudios a sus pequeños hijos ya que su mayor objetivo es preparar a sus hijos profesionalmente  en un futuro
texts.en:
Yelba lives in the city of Managua and works as a custodian in a university, where she works from 8 - 5 daily. Then she goes home to care for her young children, as she is a single mother and has to work harder to get ahead with her school age children.

Yelba is seeking a loan from Kiva in order to make some necessary modifications to her house, for instance, the electrical system. She is doing this with the goal of insuring her home. As well, she thanks Ceprodel since the loans obtained previously have improved her house little by little. They have also been used to pay for the education of her young children since her greatest objective is to prepare her children for a profession in the future.

loans.use: to buy construction materials

loans.name: Danfa's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe est composé de 21 femmes très actives dans ce banc villageois créé le  22 Juillet 2009. Elles sont toutes issues du même village et partagent des valeurs de fraternité. Elles ont comme activité principale le petit commerce.

Madame Danfa (assise à l’extrême droite avec la main gauche levée) est l’emprunteuse vedette du groupe,  âgée de 45 ans, elle est mariée et mère de 03  enfants (1 Garçons et 2 filles âgés de 10 à 18 ans). Elle achète des sacs de patates douces et des bidons de 20 litres d’huile de palm dans les marchés hebdomadaires pour la revente par détail. 
 
Avec ce prêt elle compte s’approvisionner en  plus des patates douces pour deux sacs de 10 000 F Cfa le sac, un bidon d’huile de palm pour 20 000 F Cfa et des épices pour 7 000 F Cfa.

Les bénéfices de son activité lui permettront en d’épargner d’aider son mari dans la gestion quotidienne de la famille
texts.en:
This group consists of 21 very active women from a "Banc Villageois" loan association created July 22, 2009. They are all from the same village and share fraternity values. Their main activity is small retail business.

Mrs. Danfa (seated on the far right raising her left hand) is the group's featured borrower. She is 45 years of age, and the married mother of three children (two boys and one girl between 10 and 18 years). She buys bags of sweet potatoes and 20-liter cans of palm oil in the weekly markets to be sold retail.
 
She intends to use this loan to buy two more bags of sweet potatoes at 10,000 FCFA a bag, a can of palm oil for 20,000 FCFA and spices for 7,000 FCFA.

Profits from her activity will be used for savings and to help her husband in the daily management of the family

loans.use: buy sweet potatoes, palm oil and spices

loans.name: Satou

texts.fr:
Madame Satou, habite dans un village situé à environ 40 km de Mbour. Elle évolue dans le secteur de l’élevage : emboucher des porcs pour les revendre. Satou n’a pas de charges et travaille parce que depuis le jeune âge, elle a toujours eu un penchant pour les porcs. C’est d’ailleurs pour cette raison qu’elle pratique ce métier. Elle est active de 9h à 14h et s’occupe elle-même de l’entretien de ses bêtes.
Comme c’est son premier crédit, elle pense qu’elle pourra désormais épargner, tout en améliorant les conditions alimentaires de la famille.
Elle veut augmenter le nombre de son cheptel avec l’appui de l’IMCEC, c’est là son projet pour le futur.
texts.en:
Ms. Satou lives in a village about 40 km from Mbour. She is involved in the livestock sector, namely fattening pigs for resale. 

Satou has no financial burdens and works because from an early age, she always had a penchant for pigs. It is for this reason that she performs this activity. She is active from 9 am to 2 pm and takes care of her animals herself.

As this is her first credit loan, she thinks she can now save while improving the family's nutritional conditions.

She wants to increase the size of her herd with support from IMCEC. This is her plan for the future.

loans.use: buy pigs to raise and sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy onions to store and resell later.

loans.name: Candida Rosa

texts.es:
Cándida es una señora preocupada por la salud de los demás, como profesión es auxiliar  de enfermería al servicio de un centro de salud de la zona donde habita desde hace 23 años, es casada, tiene 2 hijos a su cargo. 

   Actualmente está solicitando un pequeño financiamiento para mejorar su vivienda la cual está en mal estado, y lo utilizara en la compra de perlines, cemento, arena, bloques, golosos, zinc y mano de obra de esa manera mejorar las condiciones de vida, ya que con mucho esfuerzos ha venido realizando dichas mejoras apoyada con los financiamientos, por lo tanto le agradece a ceprodel por el apoyo oportuno para realizar sus sueños, de esas manera mejorar las condiciones y nivel  de vida.
texts.en:
Cándida is someone who is constantly concerned about other people's health.  She is a nursing auxiliary at the health center in the area where she has lived for 23 years.  She is married and has two dependent children.

She is currently requesting a small loan to renovate her home which is in disrepair.  She will use the loan to buy beams, cement, sand, blocks, screws, metal sheeting and to hire workers.  This will improve her living conditions.  Through much effort, she has carried out other renovations through previous loans.  She is grateful to Ceprodel for the support in helping her reach her goals so she can lead a better lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy beams, cement, sand, blocks, screws, metal sheeting and to hire workers.

loans.name: Elisabeth Gnima's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe composé de 04 femmes qui sont issues du même village, très solidaire entre elles, ces femmes  jouissent d’une très bonne entente et d’une réputation de femmes travailleuses. Elles ont comme activité principale le petit commerce.

Madame Elisabeth  (debout à gauche avec la main droite levée), est  l’emprunteuse vedette du groupe. Elle est âgée de 29 ans, malgré son jeune âge elle reste une femme très expérimentée dans l’activité d’achat et de vente de porcs. Elle est  mariée et mère de 02 enfants de 03 et 05 ans. Elle achète de jeune porcs auprès des villageois les engraisse pendant une quarantaine de jours pour la revente à l’état ou faire des abattages à l’occasion des fêtes et autres cérémonies religieuses. 

Avec son nouveau crédit elle va acheter une quinzaine de porcs au prix moyen de 10 000 F Cfa,  les engraisser pour la revente moyennant une marge bénéficiaire de 20 000F Cfa par bête.

Les bénéfices tirés de son activité lui permettront de participer très activement à la gestion du foyer et au renforcement de son épargne.
texts.en:
This group consists of four women who come from the same village.  They show great solidarity as a group, they get along very well with one another and they have a reputation of being very hardworking women.  Their main activity is small retail business.

Elisabeth (standing on the left-hand side and raising her right hand) is the group's featured borrower.  She is 29 years old.  In spite of her young age, she is very experienced in her activity, which consists in buying and selling pigs.  She is married and the mother of two children aged 3 and 5 years old.  She buys young pigs from the villagers, fattens them for about 40 days, and then resells them alive or slaughters them during the Holidays and other religious celebrations.

With her new loan, she will buy about 15 pigs at an average price of 10,000 CFA francs per pig.  She will fatten them for resale and make a 20,000 CFA franc profit margin per pig.

With the profits from her business, she will be able to take a very active part in the management of the household's expenses and she will also strengthen her savings.

loans.use: to buy about 15 pigs.

loans.name: Mario Santiago

texts.es:
Don Mario Santiago es originario de Masaya pero por circunstancia del trabajo se traslado a vivir a Managua, labora en una institución del estado, desempeñándose  como conductor desde hace catorce años, tiene dos hijos a su cargo, es una persona soltera que ha venido luchando por el bienestar de su familia. 

Se presento a Ceprodel para solicitar un crédito para construir un cuarto ya que la familia va creciendo y con este crédito se compra materiales  tales como cemento, hierro, arena y pago de mano de obra. 

Con este primer  financiamiento que Kiva- Ceprodel le  brinden le será de mucho apoyo, podrá darle un mejor  nivel de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Mario Santiago is originally from Masaya but due to work circumstances he had to transfer to Managua where he has worked as a driver for a state institution for 14 years.  He is single, with two children in his care, and has struggled hard for his family's well being.

He is requesting a loan through Ceprodel to build another room since his family is growing.  He will use this loan to buy materials such as cement, iron and sand, and to hire workers.

This is hist first loan through Kiva-Ceprodel and it will be very helpful, enabling him to give his family a better lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy construction materials.

loans.name: Jaminson Manuel

texts.es:
Jaminson es un joven, que desea convertirse en microempresario, razón que lo ha motivado a tener su propio negocio y comenzar a construir una mejor calidad de vida. Aprendió el oficio de soldador gracias a su padre quien se dedica a la misma actividad. Aunque no posee los recursos económicos para materializar su sueño, tiene claro que este no es un impedimento, por lo cual se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de un equipo de soldadura y adecuaciones locativas. 
Su mayor sueño en tener una condición económica estable e iniciar sus estudios universitarios.
texts.en:
Jaminson is a young man who wants to become a small business owner, and this has motivated him to have his own business and begin building a better lifestyle for himself.  He learned welding from his father who is in the same trade.  Although he does not have the economic resources to reach his goal, he believes this should not be an obstacle.  Therefore, he is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of welding equipment and in renovation of his business location.

His greatest goal is to have a stable income and begin his university studies.

loans.use: To buy welding equipment and renovate his business location.

loans.name: Maria Esperanza

texts.es: La señora Maria Esperanza mujer humilde y trabajadora toda su vida se ha dedicado a mejorar sus condiciones, espera en un futuro poder lograr su sueño, junto a su compañero de vida lucha dia a dia para sustentar su hogar el labora para una empresa privada, ella por su parte labora como profesora para un colegio del municipio donde habita, ademas se dedica a cultivar la tierra, actualmente tiene una manzana de piña y necesita con urgencia darle Mantenimiento, con este credito compra los siguientes insumos: Triple, Urea, Completo y fertilizantes, Agradece el apoyo que Afodenic y Fondos Kiva le estan brindado mediantes este financiamiento.
texts.en: Maria Esperanza is a humble woman who has worked all her life to improve her situation.  She hopes to achieve her goal in the future, together with her life partner as they struggle daily to maintain their household.  He works for a private company and she works as a teacher at a municipal school where they live.  She also cultivates the land and grows pineapple.  She is in need of an urgent loan for crop maintenance.  With this loan she will buy supplies such as Triple, Urea, Completo and fertilizers.  She is grateful for the support she is receiving  from Afodenic and Kiva through this loan.

loans.use: To buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Maria Suyapa

texts.es:
Doña María es una mujer de 43 años de edad madre de 5 hijos en un estado civil de unión libre con un grado de escolaridad cursado hasta el 4 grado. En compañía de su pareja y sus 2 hijos mayores se involucran en la agricultura en el cultivo de hortalizas, maíz, frijol y papa para generar ingresos para sus hogares. Ella se dedica a la agricultura desde muy temprana edad ya que en su familia es una tradición trabajar la tierra y fueron sus padres los que le enseñaron a limpiar, sembrar e incluso el sistema de riego a implementar para las diferentes siembras. Las tierras que trabajan son propias adquiridas con mucho esfuerzo por muchos años las cuales están ubicadas enfrente de su casa de habitación. 

Doña María solicita ayuda para la compra de semilla de papa certificada para cultivar ya que esto mejorara la cosecha y dará confianza para plantar.

Sus sueños son que sus hijas terminen de estudiar y puedan graduarse de la secundaria ya que la carrera que están sacando es de técnicas en agropecuaria por lo tanto esto ayudara a implementar nuevas y mejoradas técnicas para poder cultivar una mejor y deferente variedad.
texts.en:
María is 43 years old and a mother to five children.  She has a partner and completed up to the end of fourth grade at school.  With her partner and two oldest children, María works in farming, growing vegetables, corn, beans and potatoes in order to earn income for their respective households. María has been farming since a very early age as her family has a tradition of working the land and her parents taught her how to clean the land and plant the crops.  They also showed her the different irrigation systems that should be used for each product.  After years of effort, María now owns the land where she works, located across from her house.

María is applying for a loan to buy certified seeds to grow potatoes.  With these seeds, the harvest will be better and she will have more confidence in growing them.

María's dreams are for her daughters to finish their secondary education.  The are studying faring and this will help to implement new and better techniques for a growing a better and different variety of crops.

loans.use: to buy certified seeds for growing potatoes.

loans.name: Julian David

texts.es:
Julián tiene 29 años de edad y se dedica al oficio de la confección desde hace algún tiempo. Cuenta que el negocio pertenecía a su hermano el cual le propuso trabajar juntos y posteriormente le dejó la totalidad del negocio. 
Asegura que hasta la fecha se siente muy satisfecho con los resultados obtenidos, pues el negocio se ha convertido en la fuente de sostenimiento para sus dos hijos y padres. Se encuentra solicitando un crédito para la compra de  una máquina fileteadora industrial e insumos con el fin de remplazar una que se encuentra deteriorada por uso. Asegura que con dicha inversión mejorará tiempos de producción y aumentaran sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Julián is 29 years old and has been working as a tailor for some time.  Before the business belonged to his brother but they now work together and Julián will soon own the whole business on his own.

Julián tells us that he is very satisfied with his results as the business has become a source of support for his children and parents. He is now applying for a loan to buy supplies and an industrial overlock sewing machine to replace his current one, which has become deteriorated through use.  Julián is confident that this investment will improve production times and increase his income.

loans.use: to buy an industrial overlock sewing machine and supplies.

loans.name: Iveth Del Carmen

texts.es: Ivett, tiene 32 años, junto a su pareja habita en el barrio memorial Sandino ambos procrearon 3 hijos siendo el mayor de 13 años,  su prioridad es darles una buena educación a todos, es por eso que trabaja a diario de sol a sol como ayudante de cocina en un bufete de comida, el crédito a solicitar es para empezar a hacer la construcción de mini falda de su casa que en la actualidad es de laminas de zinc y ella desea en gran  manera ir mejorando poco a poco su casa de concreto, lo que le permitirá sentirse más segura junto a sus hijos.
texts.en: Ivett is 32 years old and, along with her partner, she lives in the Sandino barrio.  Together they have three children, the oldest of whom is 13 years old.  Ivett's priority is to give all her children a good upbringing and so she works night and day as a kitchen porter in a buffet restaurant.  Ivett is applying for a loan to start building a new wall on her home, which is currently made of corrugated iron sheets.  Ivett would really like to improve her house, building it with concrete so that she can feel safer alongside her children.

loans.use: to buy cement, iron, bricks and sand.

loans.name: Luis Holaya

texts.es:
Luis tiene 30 años de edad, y asegura que el mundo de la belleza, es una de sus grandes pasiones y en la actualidad su actividad económica. Realiza el oficio desde hace más de 13 años. Inició como empleado en diferentes salas de belleza de su localidad. Gracias a la experiencia y a las capacitaciones, Luis desarrollo su potencial y decidió convertirse en independiente. Hoy es reconocido en la zona por la gran labor que realiza. 
Se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en mejoras locativas con el fin de aumentar sus ventas e incrementar su número de clientes.
texts.en: Luis is 30 years old and tells us that the world of beauty treatments is one his greatest passions and is currently his source of income.  He has been doing this work for over thirteen years, having started as an employee in various beauty salons in town.  Thanks to his experience and training, Luis developed his potential and decided to become independent.  Luis is know well known in the area for the great work that he does.  He is applying for a loan to find better premises so that he can increase his sales and his number of customers.

loans.use: to find better premises.

loans.name: Odel

texts.es: Odel,52 años de edad, padre de tres hijos habita en la ciudad de Estelí  con su familia él se dedica a la elaboración de joyas de oro y plata desde hace mucho años  empezó lo hizo con ahorros que tenía compró las primeras máquinas con las que podría realizar este trabajo cuando era joven trabajo con familiares en este oficio el cual es su medio de vida y con el que ha preparado a  sus hijos ha tenido altibajos muchos obstáculos pero no se rinde ya que sabe que las cosas van a mejorar su meta a futuro es tener un lugar para su taller de joyería ya que en el lugar que estaba se mojaba y no tenía condiciones tuvo que cambiarse a su casa temporalmente su meta próxima es elaborar el pedido que tiene comprando el oro que necesita para lograrlo ese es su plan con este préstamo la compra de oro para hacer joyas  en este negocio cuenta con el apoyo de su familia sus productos los vende en la ciudad de Estelí.
texts.en: Odel is 52 years old and a father to three children.  He lives in the city of Estelí with his family and has been earning a living making gold and silver jewellery for many years.  He started when he used his savings to buy his first machines that he uses for this work.  When he was young, he worked with other family members in this same trade.  Odel earns his living with this work and he has brought up his children with it.  He has had ups and downs and faced many obstacles but Odel never gave up as he know that things would improve.  Odel's future goal is to have a place for his jewellery workshop as, at his last premises, the rain would come in and he is temporarily working from home.  Odel's immediate goal is to fulfill the order that he has.  He needs to buy gold for this goal.  Odel will use this loan to buy gold to make jewellery.  Odel receives support from his family with this business as they sell his products in the city of Estelí.

loans.use: to buy gold.

loans.name: Luis Segundo

texts.es:
Luis, es padre de 6 hijos, a los cuales ha logrado sacar adelante con esmero y dedicación. Ama su familia y asegura que es ésta su mayor riqueza. 
Labora diariamente como ebanista en un pequeño taller ubicado en su residencia, actividad que le permite generar el sustento económico para su hogar. 
Agradece a Dios por regalarle salud para realizar diariamente su faena, y permitir ofrecerles a sus clientes un servicio de calidad. En la actualidad es bastante reconocido en su localidad, y gracias a esto su trabajo ha aumentado. Razón que lo ha impulsado a solicitar un crédito que invertirá en la compra de materia prima (madera) al por mayor con el fin de entregar los pedidos a tiempo y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Luis is the father of 6 children. He has been able to get them ahead with hard work and dedication. He loves his family and he says that they are his greatest wealth.

He works every day as a furniture maker in a little workshop located in his residence. This activity allows him to support his home financially. He thanks God for giving him good health to do his work every day and allowing him to offer his customers a quality service. Right now, he is well known in the area, and thanks to this his work has increased. This has driven him to ask for a loan to buy raw materials (wood) wholesale in order to deliver the orders on time and improve his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy raw materials (wood) wholesale.

loans.name: Maricella

texts.es: Maricela es una joven que busca como salir adelante y ayudarle a su madre con la obligación del hogar. Motivada por una amiga decidió iniciar en el mundo de la venta de calzado, lo que le ha permitido tener una fuente de ingresos y un mejoramiento en la calidad de vida. Con el propósito de crecer, Maricela se encentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de dos vitrinas y surtido, lo que le permitirá aumentar sus ventas y tener mejores ingresos. Su mayor sueño es poder reunir el dinero suficiente para comprarle una vivienda a su madre y evitarle dolores de cabeza cuando llega la hora de pagar el arriendo. Asegura que ha pesar de las dificultades económicas que ha tenido que atravesar con su familia, es feliz porque gracias a Dios no ha faltado el alimento diario ni un techo donde albergarse.
texts.en: Maricela is a young woman seeking to get ahead and help her mother with the household obligations. Motivated by a friend, she decided to start in the world of selling shoes, which has allowed her to have a source of income and an improved quality of life. With the objective of growing, Maricela finds her self asking for a loan that she will invest in buying two display cases and some stock. This will allow her to increase her sales and have better income. Her biggest dream is to be able to save enough money to buy a store for her mother and save her the headaches when it comes time to pay the rent. She says that despite the financial difficulties that she has had to go through with her family, she is happy because thank God she hasn't lacked for food or shelter.

loans.use: to buy shoes.

loans.name: Rigoberto De Jesús

texts.es:
Rigoberto de 58 años de edad, inicio su negocio hace 20 años debido a su precaria condición económica y  a la necesidad de velar por le bienestar de sus tres hijos y esposa. Dedicado a la venta de dulces, cigarrillos y tinto de manera ambulante, este hombre ha sacado su familia adelante. 
Labora diariamente de 9:00 am hasta las 8:00 pm. En la actualidad presenta dificultades con las condiciones climáticas, ya que las lluvias que azotan por estos días la región le impide comercializar sus productos. Razón que lo ha motivado a solicitar un crédito que invertirá en la compra de una sombrilla y surtido, con el fin de continuar con el desarrollo de su labor. 
Sueña con tener un local para aumentar la variedad de productos y el número de ventas, mejorando así la calidad de vida de su grupo familiar.
texts.en:
Rigoberto is 58 years old. He started his business 20 years ago due to his precarious financial situation and the need to care for the well being of his three children and his wife. He works selling candies, cigarettes, and coffee as a street vendor. This man has been able to get his family ahead. 

He works every day from 9:00 a.m. until 8:00 p.m. Right now he has difficulties with weather conditions, since the rains that are coming down these days in the region stop him from selling his products. That is why he is motivated to ask for a loan to buy an awning and some merchandise in order to continue doing his work. He dreams of having a locale to increase the variety of products and the sales, thus improving his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy an awning and merchandise.

loans.name: Armando

texts.es: Armando, tiene 40 años vive en una casa alquilada, junto a su pareja Herlinda de 40 años y sus dos hijos, él dentro de su localidad es considerado un hombre honesto y muy trabajador, que está dispuesto a sacar adelante a su familia a base de esfuerzo y perseverancia. Armando se dedica a la agricultura en terrenos alquilados, en estos terrenos cultiva papa, arveja y flor de gladiolos , además cría vacas, toros, carneros, cerdos y asnos. Armando desea sembrar en mayor cantidad para que obtenga más alimentos, asimismo espera instalar una tienda de productos comestibles en su domicilio, esto le permitiría brindar una buena calidad de vida a sus seres queridos.Éste es el tercer crédito con KIVA y agradece el apoyo financiero recibido para seguir adelante.Armando, invertirá los S/.3000 soles en la compra de abono orgánico para nutrir sus sembríos.
texts.en: Armando is 40 years old and he lives in a rented house with his spouse Herlinda, who is 40, and their two children. At his locale, he is considered an honest and very hard working man who is willing to get his family ahead with his hard work and perseverance.  Armando works in agriculture on rented land. On the land he grows potatoes, peas, and gladiola flowers. He also raises cows, bulls, pigs and donkeys. Armando wants to plant in greater quantities so that he can obtain more food. He also hopes to set up a store of food items in his house. This will allow him to offer a good quality of life to his loved ones. This is his third loan with KIVA and he is grateful for the financial support he has received. Armando will invest the S/.3000 soles in buying organic fertilizer to feed his crops.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Bintihamisi

texts.en:
Bintihamisi is a single woman who has been working as a street vendor, selling clothes and shoes for women, men, and children since 2012. She has an established clientele.

Bintihamisi is requesting a loan to purchase jeans, clothes for men and women, and uniforms for elementary and high school students. Her major business challenge is seasonality. Bintihamisi dreams of expanding her business and become self-reliant in the future.

loans.use: to purchase jeans, clothes for men and women, and uniforms
